resources.string:
Tutorial 
 In progress 


FAQ 
 What do the hiker shaped symbols mean? 
 The hiker images located on the bottom left are indicators of the difficulty of the hike. 1 means the hike is easily accessible for most conditions, 2 stars means that some experience and physical conditioning is required Three stars indicate a trail that requires good physical condition as well as proper gear. Difficulty is based off of how well maintained the trails are, the natural terrain and the length of the route. 

 What is the heart shaped symbol? 
 These symbols mark which hike you have favorited. To access them, visit your Favorites list from the homepage? 

How do I see all the hikes available? 
 On the Home screen, click on "View All"
